title: ISic000115. I.Sicily inscription 000115
body:
1Dis · Manibus · sac(rum)
2Callis<t>o · <t>raeci · Treb(oni?) ·
3fecit · Spec<i?> · eques
4cons(ervo) · bene merenti
5v(ixit?) · XX

l.2 t | t

1DISMANIBUSSAC
2CALLISIOIRAECITREB
3FECITSPECEQUES
4CONSBENEMERENTI
5VXX

l.2 t | t

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text based on ILTermini;
  • Line1: Gualtherus: CALLISIO·IRAECI

English translation

Tuuli Ahlholm

Sacred to the Shades of the Underworld; to Callistus, a thraex (of Trebonius?). Spec(i?)es, an eques, made (this) to his well-deserving fellow-slave, who lived 20 years (?).

commentary
